p.k: 67% Award-winning biopic of legendary oceanographer and filmmaker Jacques-Yves Cousteau, starring Lambert Wilson and Amelie's Audrey Tautou. In French with English subtitles
71% Hundreds of Korean prisoners forced to work in a brutal Japanese labour camp attempt a daring escape. Award-winning WWII action. In Korean with English subtitles
76% Terrence Malick directs an epic war drama, set during the battle for Guadalcanal. Sean Penn, James Caviezel and Adrien Brody star
72% Bruising WWII drama starring John Wayne in one of the roles which made him a star. He was Oscar nominated as the hard-nosed marine knocking recruits into shape

p.n: The Bridge On The River Kwai
p.k: 81% William Holden and Alec Guinness star as British POWs charged with building a bridge that their own side want to obliterate
